Name: CamGirls: Sophie X Rias
About the game: Follow Sophie as she embarks on her latest adventure in making money, working alongside the enigmatic Rias as they put on a special camgirl show for their viewers. Your decisions in this short Yuri/Lesbian story will determine how successful the show is and whether Sophie finds a new source of funds to live off, or must resort to drastic measures to keep going! A Visual Novel Game with Multiple Choices Alternate Endings based on your Choices Adult content and sex scenes to explore Fun comedic moments to enjoy A special bonus epilogue to uncover! * All characters included in the game are over the age of 18.
